channel.title: local on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in local on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Dev environment
item.description: ##15:00 Wednesday 17 December 2014 JST## Got a pretty good start on setting up local dev environment for CB dev. Alfonzo gave me a huge head start by sending a virtualbox image of the environment. I cloned the code from git repo and when I edit locally it saves to the virtual computer. I’ve gotten over the initial bewilderment of a computer running on my computer, but it’s still pretty cool.
